Text: Anyone know wtf is happening to the torrents? I just grabbed the torrent from this page on my other computer but when I bring it up here, less than a minute later, no more torrent link. The "download torrent" link appears with new posts but vanishes almost immediately.
The Pirate Bay has swtched to Magnet links only from now on
bot  sure  what this  magnet thing  is   or  what  I  am  supposed  to  do  with  it....
